About Me

My name is Wai Taing Lam, Timothy. I am a senior at UC San Diego majoring in Computer Science, where I spend most of my time either coding, debugging, or wondering why my code isn't working. My interests lie in machine learning and data analysis.

Previously, I worked at MTR Hong Kong, where I developed an automated database system for analyzing overhead-line smart maintenance data. I streamlined data processing workflows, making analysis faster and more efficient while helping engineers make informed decisions.

Beyond coding, I'm a huge soccer fan (diehard Tottenham Hotspurs fan), a gym-goer who skips leg day, and a music lover who curates playlists on Spotify. When I’m not coding, I’m probably learning something new—or sleeping.
